basic.description: The history of the Indian subcontinent from the eighteenth century to the present. Topics include the decline of the Mughal Empire, the nature of British colonial domination, the nationalist movement and the processes by which India came to be defined as a modern nation. Course materials include standard works of history, newspapers, novels and images.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Introduction to Modern India: Nationalism, Modernity, Postcolonialism
